text: Paolo Bonaiuti (7 July 1940 â€“ 16 October 2019) was an Italian politician and journalist. He was born in Florence. Bonaiuti worked for Il Giorno. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1996 to 2013 and Senate from 2013 to 2018. Bonaiuti died on 16 October 2019 in Rome after a long-illness at the age of 79.E' morto Paolo Bonaiuti, ex portavoce di Berlusconi ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:20th-century Italian writers Category:Italian journalists Category:Politicians from Florence
title: Paolo Bonaiuti
